text:
RAJAPALAYAM

Ramco Institute of Technology: Department of Computer Science and Engineering, five-day ICTACT – Faculty Development Programme on “Cloud Infrastructure and Services,” inauguration by R.V. Mahendra Gowda, Principal, Computer Science and Engineering Seminar Hall, 9:30 a.m.

DEVAKOTTAI

Chairman Manickavasagam Middle School: Felicitation function for teacher T Muthumeenal, R. Chandramohan, Principal, chief guest, Sevugan Annamalai Arts and Science College, school campus, 9:30 a.m.
title: Engagements
